links.description: Have you ever wondered how stock traders are able to make good investing decision fast? When share prices are falling, should you buy or sell? Or when the price spikes, should you sell or buy more? How to tell stock swings from corrections?

links.title: Benzinga's Bulls & Bears Of The Week: Alphabet, Apple, Microsoft, Tesla And More
links.description: Benzinga has featured looks at many investor favorite stocks over the past week. Bullish calls included two tech giants and some investor conference picks. Bearish calls included semiconductor makers and REITs. The broader equity markets are around 2 percent higher over the past month, thanks in part to the largely solid first-quarter results that have been posted thus far.

messages.body: $AAPL http://aaplmodel.blogspot.com/2018/04/fiscal-2q-2018-final-estimates.html

links.title: Fiscal 2Q 2018 Final Estimates
links.description: As of Thursday's market close of $167.78, AAPL is trading at a 12.3x multiple on my next-twelve-months EPS estimate (10.8x when excluding next-12m net cash and div). The key immediate question for this earnings report is the capital return update, in particular the planned level of share repurchase necessary to achieve management's stated goal of reaching zero net cash balance over time.

messages.body: $AAPL Quincy Mercel's final estimate. All shall be know Tuesday.
$AAPL Mark Newton, technical analyst at Newton Advisors, sees a possible bear market correction ahead for Apple. https://stocknews.com/news/aapl-analyst-dont-buy-apple-inc-aapl-until-it-enters-bear/

links.title: Analyst: Don't Buy Apple Inc. (AAPL) Until It Enters Bear Market Territory
links.description: Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL) has underperformed this year amid slowing growth expectations, and one prominent Wall Street mind sees significantly more potential downside ahead. As CNBC reports, Mark Newton, technical analyst at Newton Advisors is telling investors to sit on the sidelines amid some bearish-looking charts: "Until that shows signs of improving, I'd be a buyer on pullbacks right near $130 and really a seller up near $180," Newton said.

messages.body: Week In Review: How Trump's Policies Moved Stocks $ZTCOY $OCLR $NPTN $AAPL $FNSR $ACIA $LITE $AMD $IBM $NVDA $QCOM https://goo.gl/oSqvnh

links.title: Week In Review: How Trump's Policies Moved Tech Stocks
links.description: Catch up on the stocks that were impacted, or were predicted to be impacted, by the comments, actions and policies of President Trump and his administration with this weekly recap.
